name: Shuttlerock
overview:
Shuttlerock is the next generation internet engagement platform for your website. It provides the freedom for customers, staff, partners and others to engage with your company website.

Shuttlerock is a white label photo and content sharing platform embedded on your website. It allows you to generate, curate and publish photos and stories.

It means that your website is no longer one dimensional; it’s now multi dimensional using customers, staff and partners and their social channels to bring your site to life.

So why do you need Shuttlerock?

  1. It helps you easily generate content which keeps your website fresh, relevant and engaging.

  2. It enables your customers, partners, supporters, staff and fans to interact with your website and keep them up to date.

  3. It brings your customers back to your most important digital asset – your website.

What are the key benefits?

  • More high quality user sessions leading to more sales
  • Generates ‘real’ content from ‘real’ people: content marketing
  • Better interaction with customers AND their friends: a social platform on your website.
  • And more control of the customer relationship, content and conversations.
  • Creates an on-going source on fresh content which you can share to your company social channels.
  • Higher search engine rankings.
  • Search engines require fresh content and they rate the social conversations that Shuttlerock encourages.
  • Opt in email address database of your customers AND their friends.

Specialties Content platform, Digital Marketing, Photo competition software, Social media platform, Content Aggregation platform, On line marketing, Content Marketing, User Driven content, fresh content creation, SEO tool, Email database generator, Fresh Content creator
